msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; some writing on the Verso
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: This light-brown papyrus is regularly cut at the right and the left. Kollesis at center and at the right edge. (TC)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the tax payer. Diairesis used occasionally. (TC)

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
origin.persName: Phanomgeus, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Taptosiris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 245)
Chairemon, his son, mother Tbelles (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 247)
Kastor, son of Sisois, grandson of Petheus, mother Thaisas (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 182)
Ptolemaios, son of Esouris, grandson of Heras, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 216)
Deios, son of Petheus, grandson of Heras, mother Tapetheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 160)
Petaus, son of Esouris, grandson of Petheus, mother Tkollauthis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 208)
Heras, son of Onnophris, grandson of Onnophris, mother Sopas (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 169)
Tasoucharion, daughter of Apollonios (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 239)
Harpakysis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 155)
Didymos, son of Petheus, grandson of Heraklas, mother Eserempis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 161)
Onnophris, son of Petheus, grandson of Teos, mother Segathis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 192)
Petaus, son of Herieus, grandson of Petaus, mother Tlemenesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 208)
Sisois, son of Naaraus the younger, grandson of Theabennis, mother Thaisas (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 229)
Ptolemaios, son of Heron, grandson of Horos, mother Tasoucharion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 217)
Apynchis, son of Petermouthis, grandson of Apynchis, mother Thermouthis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 154)
Theabennis, son of Harphaesis, grandson of Theabennis, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 175)
Petsiris, son of Pasion, grandson of Petsiris, mother Taonnophris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 211)
Patkonnis, son of Mysthes, grandson of Patkonnis, mother Taonnophris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 200)
Sabeinos, son of Pasoknopaios, grandson of Horos, mother Tapetheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 222)
Petheus, son of Heron, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Eserempis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 201)
Protarchos, son of Leonides, grandson of Anchophis, mother Herais (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 215)
Orsenouphis, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Soeris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 194)
Petheus, son of Petaus, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Segathis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 203)
Limnaios, son of Onnophris, grandson of Satabous, mother Ptolema (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 185)
Pnepheros, son Ptolemaios, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 213)
Kames, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Ptollion, mother Tapetheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 180)
Pnepheros, son of Petheus, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Thaisas (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 213)
Ptolemaios, son of Phaesis, grandson of Petheus, mother Tanais (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 219)
Onnophris, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Tapetheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 192)
in total for the day drachmas 40
(Epeiph) 10 likewise:
Tanomgeus, daughter of Pakysis (wife of Maximus Picer) (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 234)
Ptolemaios, son of Doras, grandson of Apollonios, mother Tauris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 216)
Horion, son of Lupus, grandson of Horos, mother Ammonaris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 248)

provenance.p: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

keywords.term: see electronic version of P.Mich. IV, 224;

div.ab: "(Column) 79:;Phanomgeus, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Taptosiris, copper drachma (that of priests) drachmas 4;;Chairemon, his son, mother Tbelles, copper drachma (that of priests) drachmas 4;;Kastor, son of Sisois, grandson of Petheus, mother Thaisas, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Esouris, grandson of Heras, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Deios, son of Petheus, grandson of Heras, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 8;;Petaus, son of Esouris, grandson of Petheus, mother Tkollauthis, copper drachmas 4;;Heras, son of Onnophris, grandson of Onnophris, mother Sopas, copper drachmas 4;;Tasoucharion, daughter of Apollonios (Harpakysis);;(in left margin: drachmas 104 obols 28) geometria of year 12 drachmas 101, surcharges drachmas 7 obols 2, in total drachmas 107 obols 2;;in total for the day drachmas 164 obols 28.;(Epeiph) 7 likewise:;Didymos, son of Petheus, grandson of Heraklas, mother Eserempis, drachmas 4 copper drachmas 4;;Onnophris, son of Petheus, grandson of Teos, mother Segathis, copper drachmas 4;;Petaus, son of Herieus, grandson of Petaus, mother Tlemenesis, drachmas 4;;Sisois, son of Naaraus the younger, grandson of Theabennis, mother Thaisas, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Heron, grandson of Horos, mother Tasoucharion, copper drachmas 8;;Apynchis, son of Petermouthis, grandson of Apynchis, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 32.;(Epeiph) 8 likewise:;Theabennis, son of Harphaesis, grandson of Theabennis, mother Thaesis, copper drachmas 4;;Horos the younger, son of Hatres, grandson of Horos, mother Teraus, copper drachmas 4;;Petsiris, son of Pasion, grandson of Petsiris, mother Taonnophris, copper drachmas 4;;Patkonnis, son of Mysthes, grandson of Patkonnis, mother Taonnophris, drachmas 8;;Sabeinos, son of Pasoknopaios, grandson of Horos, mother Tapetheus, copper drachmas 8;;Petheus, son of Heron, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Eserempis, drachmas 4 copper drachmas 4;;Protarchos, son of Leonides, grandson of Anchophis, mother Herais, drachmas 8;;Orsenouphis, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Soeris, drachmas 4;;Petheus, son of Petaus, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Segathis, copper drachmas 4;;Limnaios, son of Onnophris, grandson of Satabous, mother Ptolema, drachmas 8;;in total for the day drachmas 56;;Epeiph 9 likewise:;Pnepheros, son Ptolemaios, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Thaesis, drachmas 16 copper drachmas 4;;Kames, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Ptollion, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 8;;Pnepheros, son of Petheus, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Thaisas, copper drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Phaesis, grandson of Petheus, mother Tanais, drachmas 4;;Onnophris, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Tapetheus, copper drachmas (that of priests) 4;;in total for the day drachmas 40.;(Epeiph) 10 likewise:;Tanomgeus, daughter of Pakysis (wife of Maximus Picer);(in left margin: drachmas 12 obols 12) geometria of year 12 drachmas 12 obols 3, surcharges obols 4.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 13 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;Ptolemaios, son of Doras, grandson of Apollonios, mother Tauris, drachmas 4;;Horion, son of Lupus, grandson of Horos, mother Ammonaris, drachmas 8."
